hero.title: Technologies for Optimal Conditions
hero.p: Comprehensive solutions for poultry farms — from ventilation to automated feeding systems.

items.content: Modern solutions for efficient broiler chicken farming
Want to launch your poultry farm without complications or unnecessary costs
We will help you through the entire process — from concept to a fully operational production facility.

stages.title: Turnkey Business Launch Stages
stages.subtitle1: We specialize in the development and production of advanced equipment for poultry farms.
stages.subtitle2: Our mission is to provide innovative and reliable solutions that increase the efficiency and profitability of your business.

stage1.title: Consultation and Project Analysis
stage1.description: We determine what kind of poultry farm you need and what site conditions are required.

stage2.title: Design and Calculations
stage2.description: We create a technical plan and select equipment for your specific needs.

stage3.title: Equipment Supply
stage3.description: We manufacture and supply a complete set of systems for broiler farming.

stage4.title: Turnkey Installation and Launch
stage4.description: We install, connect, and configure — the farm is ready to operate.

about-us.subtitle: About
about-us.title:
About Our
Company
about-us.p1: We specialize in the development and manufacture of advanced equipment for poultry farms.
about-us.p2: Our mission is to provide innovative and reliable solutions that increase the efficiency and profitability of your business.

accordion.question: What does the turnkey service for opening a poultry farm include?
accordion.answer: We provide a full range of services: designing the poultry farm according to your requirements, supplying and installing all necessary equipment (ventilation, feeding, watering, lighting systems), commissioning, staff training, and ongoing technical support. You receive a ready-to-operate production facility optimized for maximum efficiency.

accordion.question: What equipment do you manufacture and supply?
accordion.answer: We specialize in a full range of equipment for poultry farms: modern ventilation and climate-control systems, automatic feeders and drinkers of various types, high-efficiency air purification filters, LED lighting for poultry farming, and climate control systems. All equipment meets international quality standards and is adapted to the conditions of Central Asia.

accordion.question: How long does it take to launch a poultry farm?
accordion.answer: Timelines depend on the project scale. For a small farm (up to 10,000 birds) the full cycle from design to launch takes 2–3 months. Medium farms (up to 50,000 birds) require 3–5 months. Large projects can take 6–9 months. We prepare a detailed work schedule during the design phase and adhere to it strictly.

accordion.question: Do you provide warranty and after-sales service?
accordion.answer: Yes, all supplied equipment comes with a warranty of 12 to 24 months depending on the type. We provide full technical support: scheduled maintenance, prompt repairs, spare parts supply, and expert consultations 24/7. We also conduct regular training for your staff on equipment operation and maintenance.

hero.title: About Company
hero.subtitle: Technologies that make it more efficient and reliable

equipment.title: Turnkey Equipment
equipment.description: We are engaged in the production of equipment that meets modern quality standards and the requirements of poultry farms.

stages.title: Project Stages
stages.projectDescription: The project is implemented in stages with control of each step and compliance with technical standards. All decisions are made accurately and thoughtfully.
stages.clientTasks: We take into account the client's tasks and operating conditions, ensure stable and reliable operation of the equipment.

step1.title: Analysis and Consultation
step1.description: We study the client's tasks, farm features and equipment requirements. We select optimal solutions based on specific conditions and project parameters.

step2.title: Solution Design
step2.description: We develop engineering and technological solutions. We form a project taking into account the necessary standards and safety of future operation.

step3.title: Equipment Manufacturing
step3.description: We produce and complete equipment, conduct testing and quality control at all stages of production.

step4.title: Installation and Launch
step4.description: We install equipment at the facility, check the operation of systems and train personnel for stable and efficient operation.

certificates.label: Certificates
certificates.title: Our Certificates
certificates.p1: Our equipment is certified and complies with international quality and safety standards.
certificates.p2: This ensures reliable and stable operation under real-world conditions.

partners.label: Partners
partners.title: Our Partners
partners.p1: Over 15 years of operation, hundreds of customers and partners across different regions have trusted us.
partners.p2: Our partners are trusted companies and manufacturers with whom we jointly implement effective poultry farming solutions.
